entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
